snippet.title: Nobody Wants to Die - Official Gameplay Trailer | IGN Live 2024
snippet.description:
Lose yourself in the world of New York, 2329, where immortality comes at a price that someone has to pay. Following a near-death experience, Detective James Karra takes an off-the-books case from his chief with only the help of a young police liaison, Sara Kai, to assist him. Time reveals all as they risk everything in pursuit of a killer, uncovering the dark secrets of the city's elite. You can wishlist Nobody Wants to Die is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam. Wishlist it now.

Presented by PlayStation, Days of Play are happening now until June 12th

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive
